sub_title: Secretary BoE Maastricht University | Chief of Internal affairs JFV Ouranos | LL.M. Candidate
summary:
LL.M. Candidate in Globalisation and Law with a focus on international trade and investment law. Ba Graduate in European Studies, specialising in International and European Law and successful participant in the MaRBLe excellence programme at Maastricht University. 

Interested in politics, law, business, policy, and languages. Aspiring to work in a multi-disciplinairy, dynamic and diverse international environment. Takes interest in both the technical and social fields with a keen interest in multi-level governance, environmental policy and law.

My greatest asset is my determination.

projects.title: Europe in your own environment
projects.description: A research about the influence of the European Union in the Southern region of the Netherlands. In this research we investigated how the European Union influences the development of Maasvlakte II and the production of the sustainable gas LNG in the region of Rotterdam. This research was executed in Dutch and English. The results were published in English.

contributors.headline: Secretary BoE Maastricht University | Chief of Internal affairs JFV Ouranos | LL.M. Candidate

projects.title: Model United Nations
projects.description: A project about debating world problems. In this project we discussed the nuclear problems in North Korea , the problems in Syria and the civil war in (South) Sudan. In this project we represented the delegation of Japan.

contributors.headline: Secretary BoE Maastricht University | Chief of Internal affairs JFV Ouranos | LL.M. Candidate

projects.title: EUMIND go green
projects.description: A research about the most use of water by teenagers and the effect of this on the ecosystem. This research is fully executed in English. The results were shared with Indian schools.

projects.title: Touch of Dutch
projects.description:
Awarded first prize by the Canadian embassy in the Hague, the Netherlands.
An international project between several Dutch schools and Canadian schools with the main research question being: "what does the friendship between Canada and the Netherlands look like in the future?".

profile_positions.title: European Careers Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
SIRE Life Sciences is a Recruitment & Executive Search Consultancy dedicated exclusively to the European Life Science industry. SIRE Life Sciences provides a “Complete-Life-Science-Cycle-Search-Solution” to Life Science Employers operating in the European Life Science sector. We offer a tailor made European-wide service for both Permanent or Freelance solutions specialized in delivering into the world’s leading institutions.

SIRE Life Sciences has highly skilled teams of Recruitment, Executive Search and Staffing Issues Specialists, providing premium tailored Life Science recruitment solutions and advice on staffing issues, particularly executive search and retention.

- Executive Search & Advisory
- Permanent Search & Selection
- Freelance & Temporary Staffing Solutions
- Brokering Services
- Compliancy Services
- Expat Services
- Pay-rolling
- Assessments
- Retention and Outplacement
- Coaching & Training
- Staffing Consultancy
- In-house Services
- Custom Made Solutions
- Market intelligence

volunteer_experiences.description:
Board management of a graphic design startup. I help organize and structure the startup through the following activities:

- Market research for pricing
- Establishing simple client contracts
- Organizing board management meetings
- Establishing guidelines for intellectual property licensing
- General market research
- Promotional research and implementation

Agent on the social media platform Jodel for the city Maastricht. Tasks include checking the content of messages and taking responsibility to ensure the safety of the community. Additionally, I was able to test beta versions of the app and provide feedback in combination with minor translation tasks. Through this experience I have learned to cooperate in an international team while monitoring the city of Maastricht. Moreover, I have learned more about the ins- and outs of social media. As of September 2019 - Part of the startup of the Dutch Social Media Group.

Publication of study related material such as summaries and solutions to problems. Additionally, I have been tutoring the course 'micro/macro economics' of the Ba European Studies year 1. This experience has taught me the skill of helping others, planning, presenting and feedback.
Organised multiple weekly trainings for young kids at the local hockey club. Activities consisted of planning, organising and executing the training.
Hier heb ik in opdracht van de maatschappelijke stage geholpen met het begeleiden van kinderen tijdens naschoolse activiteiten.
Hier heb ik verschillende dieren verzorgd en geholpen met het schoonhouden van de winkel.
